column2: select TOP # albums.AlbumName, abcount(albums.AlbumName) as NumSongs, sum(albums.TrackPrice) as AlbumPrice FROM ( SELECT a.Title as AlbumName, ar.Name, t.UnitPrice as TrackPrice FROM chinook.Track AS t INNER JOIN chinook.Album as a ON t.AlbumId = a.AlbumId INNER JOIN chinook.Artist as ar ON a.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId ) albums GROUP BY albums.AlbumName ORDER BY AlbumPrice DESC
